amendment.description: Amendment sought to provide that when a legal challenge to a CFTC regulation is first reviewed by the district court, any appeal to such decision would then go to the court of appeals.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 6 printed in House Report 113-476 to preserve existing law by striking "United States Court of Appeals for the District of Columbia Circuit or the United States Court of Appeals for the circuit," and replace it with "United States District Court for the District of Columbia or the United States District Court for the district.".

action.text: Amendment (A006) offered by Ms. Jackson Lee.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson Lee amendment (A006) Failed by recorded vote: 177 - 233 (Roll no. 346).
